text:
Not all unethical actions are illegal, and not all illegal actions are unethical. In some
places it may be illegal to report one's employer's actions against the best interests of
clients by sharing what is considered private company information with authorities, but
doing so may be considered ethical “whistleblowing” behavior by some. Acts of civil
disobedience that are illegal are also considered by many to be ethical behavior. On the
other hand, recommending investment in a relative's firm without disclosure may not be
illegal, but would be considered unethical by many.
